title: Skeleton Vocalizations
description: Skeleton Vocalizations sound package with 228 high-quality monster sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/skeleton-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/8qycnx16edcarqg/MSE%20-%20Skeleton%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


The skeleton is a servant of darkness, he was only recently human, but the dark side has taken over. He has the height and speed of a human, but the rage and energy of a necromancer can be heard in his voice.

All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 13 voice actions, including 228 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 24 voice sounds during an attack
  • 24 battle shouts
  • 24 deaths
  • 24 growls
  • 24 pains
  • 32 roars
  • 8 snarling sounds
  • 16 victory shouts
  • 8 groans
  • 8 sounds of laughing and taunting
  • 8 idle and speech sounds
  • 12 sounds of jumping and action
  • 16 snorting and grunting sounds


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs. 


This package is perfect for creating the voices of monsters: skeleton, zombie, orc, necromancer, demon and other undead creatures. 

Can be used for bosses, like the Skeleton King or the Dark Knight.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 228 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 13 voice actions
  • 128 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 56 voice samples of the pain type
  • 44 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 228

Number of Audio Cues: 228

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 05 minutes 11 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
